We the undersigned request that the Department for Energy & Climate Change be abolished immediately.

DECC is no friend of the poor or fuel impoverished, protecting wasteful green levies and windfarm subsidies, keeping them in place while people go hungry or cold demonstrates that this department is unfit for purpose.
80% of the public want green taxes removed, DECC is therefore against the majority of public feeling and acting undemocratically.
DECC policies are enemies of common sense, matters of sound science and public good.
